duties_responsibilities.duty: Shoveling, sweeping, steam cleaning, painting, mechanical assistance, lifting, pushing and pulling various objects and raking.
Properly complete required paperwork/records regarding repairs and maintenance.
Able to use good judgement in decision-making and be able to work with or without direct supervision.
Willing to learn all aspects of the rail yard.
Willing to work nights and weekends, if necessary.

skills.skill: Ability to read and comprehend simple instructions and short correspondence.
Ability to effectively present information in one-on-one and small group situations, and other employees of the organization.
Ability to apply common sense understanding to carry out simple one- or two- step instructions.
Ability to deal with standardized situations with only occasional or no variables.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED), or one to three months related experience and/or training; or equivalent combinations of education and experience.
